title: Multiple Input Errors
detail: Following errors encountered while updating the onboarding Settings

errors.title: Security config limit already exhausted
errors.detail: Contract has already reached limit on activated security configs, new security configuration cannot be created.

errors.title: Security policy limit already exhausted in the selected config
errors.detail: Security config has already reached limit on security policies, new security policy cannot be created.

errors.title: CPS Certificate quota already exhausted
errors.detail: Contract has already reached limit on DV SAN certificates, new certificate cannot be created.

errors.title: Enrollment does not exist
errors.detail: Selected certificate enrollment : %d does not exist

errors.title: Security configuration does not exist
errors.detail: Security configuration : %d does not exist in selected contract.

errors.title: Security policy does not exist
errors.detail: Security policy : %d does not exist in selected security configuration
